content: Title.Whales are going to start selling like last cycle.Don't fall for the trap. Don't sell unless you absolutely have to!Bitcoin is freedom. Do not sell your freedom. Hodl it until fiat becomes less popular than bitcoin. Give it to your grandkids if you have to. Do not sell your freedom.EDIT: Made some changes to calm people down. 🧡

comments.author: legendbtc
comments.body: Quote from: Filippo Spina on June 01, 2024, 12:10:32 PM Hodl it until fiat goes away entirely. Give it to your grandkids if you have to. Do not sell your freedom.I am pretty sure that fiat currency will never completely disappear or even if it is no longer used there will definitely be an upgraded version of it that will be introduced and will still be created by the government. So waiting for fiat money to disappear is just a waste of time and meaningless. I invest in bitcoin and want to become financially free and have a better life. I don't think it's my responsibility to hold on to bitcoins and give them to my grandchildren while my parents, wife and children have to live a difficult life. There will be no freedom if you still live in poverty and don't have enough money to take care of yourself and your loved ones right now.

Do not sell your freedom.I don't understand how we can get freedom if we are not selling at all. To use the benefits associated with it, we will either have to sell or use our assets or you will only be keeping them forever, giving them to your kids and grandkids. How will Bitcoin provide us freedom if we keep holding it forever? It's freedom when it is used, and if we are honest with ourselves, we should know that fiat is not going anywhere, at least for very soon.The world might become completely digitalized, currencies might turn into digital currencies and the concept of cash might disappear, but fiat will still be there, the government and traditional financial institutions will always have their control over us because we are compelled to use their currencies even if we don't want to.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Quote from: Filippo Spina on June 01, 2024, 12:10:32 PMTitle.Whales are going to start selling like last cycle.Don't fall for the trap. Do NOT sell.Bitcoin is freedom. Do not sell your freedom. Hodl it until fiat goes away entirely. Give it to your grandkids if you have to. Do not sell your freedom.Whale manipulation is quite common with Bitcoin. Weak hands will always fall the trap but strong hands will be able to resist the panic. I have seen such manipulation and have seen the panic in the market in 2018. After 2021 it is not happening as it was earlier due to the fact that institutional investors entering the Bitcoin market. After the ETF approval it has gone down drastically as it is not that easy to manipulate the price of Bitcoin. I don't agree with your point that it is important to keep holding Bitcoin. If that is the case then after a certain time there won't be any Bitcoin available to buy or sell. To increase the adoption of Bitcoin it is important to hold, buy and sell Bitcoin but always avoid panic sell.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Bitcoin is a commodity and buying and selling keeps the market going. Everyone have their reasons of buying bitcoin and everyone is also free to do whatever that they want with their bitcoin, because we cannot hodli till infinity. I am not investing and keep all for my kids, but I will also enjoy from the fruit of my labour and that is why selling is also part of the agenda.I will sell amd still hodli a higher portion, so I don't see selling as a problem. The most important thing is that I still have more bitcoin in my bags and I accumulate more when I can. Reaching my bitcoin target is my goal and if I reach my goal  what next...shaving of profit from time to time.

comments.body: If they start to sell and I hope that you've got the silver tongue on this one, I think that I'll probably empty out the spare money that I have in my bank account because I know that it's a trap and selling would be the worst thing to do, trying to surf the waves that a whale would make is disastrous, much better to wait a bit and see where the market goes, I mean most of the time when it's whales, the outcome is almost always the same.
